title: font ID help
content:
Last time I posted I got a great, quick response I was hoping again for help identifying a font. Can anyone recognize the font used for "THE SLEEPERS" heading?

thanks for any help :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203211518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/532281531_466a69a090_o_4593.jpg)
author: kdiduck

comments.content: Err..it's probably [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203211518/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=trajan&x=0&y=0&sample_text=SLEEPERS) with a custom R

Yes, and the script is [Edwardian](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203211518/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_edwardian_script_com_regular/), with alternate caps (check the complete view of its character set).
That custom R is really badly done...
Nevermind badly done..it's completely pointless and unnecessary.
Nevermind badly done..it's completely pointless and unnecessary.
